method: Pour kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full
Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the peppermint schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full
Done correctly, the schnapps will flow under the kahlua for a clear layer
Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of bailey's
Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up
Done correctly, this will provide a layer of bailey's floating over the kahlua
Toss it down all at once for something like a peppermint pattie, with a bang!!! note: best if all ingredients are chilled
